genshinstrument.genshin_disclaimer.title: Disclaimer!
genshinstrument.genshin_disclaimer.conte:
Genshin Instruments is an %s and %s Minecraft mod that is in no way affiliated with neither Genshin Impact nor HoYoverse.

Thus, all Genshin-related assets used in-game, such as sounds, images, instruments etc. are of complete ownership to HoYoverse.

As the user, you have the full responsibility over your actions within the game, including (but not limited to!) playing and sharing/publishing any songs that may be protected under copyright laws.
button.genshinstrument.audioChannels.ste:
NOTICE: Because of some annoying specification by OpenAL, all sounds produced on Stereo will be stuck on 100%.
This includes some instruments.
button.genshinstrument.audioChannels.mix:
If the Instruments sound category is set to 100%, you will hear instruments on Stereo within %s blocks of range.
Otherwise, you will hear Mono.
button.genshinstrument.stop_music_on_pla: When you or other players within %s blocks of range play an instrument, Minecraft's background music will stop.
button.genshinstrument.shared_instrument: See what other notes players nearby are playing in your instrument's screen
button.genshinstrument.accurate_notes.to: When on, provides a pitch-accurate representation of the note symbols and accidentals used by this instrument's layout
button.genshinstrument.fixedTouch.toolti: Defines whether the velocity of a note press will not affect the instrument's volume
button.genshinstrument.extendOctaves.too:
When a note that is higher/lower than the usual octave range is played, will automatically adjust the pitch to match your playings. Can only extend up to 1 octave per side: high and low C.
Blame Minecraft.
The MIDI keyboard will be split in middle C, such that low C plays Don and high plays Ka
button.genshinstrument.normalize_vintage: Normalizes all flattened notes in the Vintage Lyre. Does not apply to the max pitch.
button.genshinstrument.label: Note Labels Type
genshinstrument.advancements.main.root.d: Though wine may not be by your side, the instruments will always walk you through the Game of Freedom.
genshinstrument.advancements.main.master: Have all Genshin instruments in your inventory at once
